name: Gateway Portal - Protocol Infrastructure & Governance Hub
description: Multi-token paymaster system, node staking, app registry, cross-chain intents, and decentralized moderation governance

skills.name: List Protocol Tokens
skills.description: Get all tokens with deployed paymasters

skills.name: Get Node Statistics
skills.description: Get network node statistics and health

skills.name: List Registered Apps
skills.description: Get all apps registered in the ERC-8004 registry

skills.name: Get Apps by Tag
skills.description: Find apps by category tag (game, marketplace, defi, etc.)

skills.name: Check Ban Status
skills.description: Check if an address is banned or on notice in the moderation system

skills.name: Get Moderator Profile
skills.description: Get full moderator profile including reputation, P&L, and voting power

skills.name: Get Moderation Cases
skills.description: List all moderation cases with voting status and outcomes

skills.name: Get Case Details
skills.description: Get full details of a specific moderation case including votes and evidence

skills.name: Get Reports
skills.description: List submitted reports with status and voting period

skills.name: Get Agent Labels
skills.description: Get reputation labels for an agent (HACKER, SCAMMER, TRUSTED, etc.)

skills.name: Get Moderation Stats
skills.description: Get system-wide moderation statistics including ban rates and stake totals

skills.name: Prepare Moderation Stake
skills.description: Prepare transaction to stake ETH and become a moderator

skills.name: Prepare Report
skills.description: Prepare transaction to report a user for violations

skills.name: Prepare Vote
skills.description: Prepare transaction to vote BAN or CLEAR on a moderation case

skills.name: Prepare Challenge
skills.description: Prepare transaction to challenge a ban decision

skills.name: Prepare Appeal
skills.description: Prepare transaction to appeal a resolved ban (requires 10x stake)
